department: Department of Public Works and Government Services PSPC
short_summary: Competitive - Open bidding for the acquisition and delivery of racks for the storage of small arms
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal
### Contract Information

**Title:** W0106-22J006 - Weapon Racks
**Reference Number:** WS3570585360
**Solicitation Number:** WS3570585360
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-13
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-03T14:00:00

### Tender Requirements

* The acquisition and delivery of racks for the storage of small arms.
* The contract's expected start date is not specified, but it is expected to conclude on 2024-01-13.
* The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence.
* The location for the contract is Shannon.

### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price (LPTA) - Price as defined in the solicitation document.

### Trade Agreements and Exclusions

* The contract is open to bidders who are not participating in any trade agreements.
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Procurement Method

* This is a competitive tender that is open to all bidders following the process defined in the solicitation document.

### Contact Information

* Annie Deslauriers (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Documents

Please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14355983?extsite=MTQzNTU5ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== for further information and supporting documents.
 
In compliance with this request for proposal, all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) on November 3, 2022. Any submission after 2:00 p.m. will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

The tenderer must attend a dialogue between 10:00 and 12:00 on October 28, 2021. More details are available in Part 7 of the requirements document. For more detailed information, please see the solicitation document attached to the notice.

The details and information of this request for proposal have been thoroughly detailed in the solicitation document. For more information, it is necessorary to visit the solicitation document recorded in this notice. For further information, kindly visit the attached notice and the solicitations documents
